title: My phone and tablet don't work right I do work on it and can't get my pay phone sometime don't ring
content: Don't know what type of pixel they said they gave me this as a rehab and no directions and I had a flip phone and move here 10 years ago and had 7 phones and before I had just 1 for 30 years and I don't think people at Verizon don't know what to do I am ready to go to someone else because of this
